    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primarystage)
      Sets the stage for a JavaFx GUI. The GUI will prompt the user for a file name and a url to be scanned.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      primarystage - Sets the JavaFx stage

    • createFile

      public File createFile(String filename)
      Returns a file object if the file does not already exist. Displays alertbox if file was successfully created or not.
      Parameters:
      filename - string input from user
      Returns:
      file object created with filename input from user

    • getURL

      public Scanner getURL(String urlinput) throws IOException
      Reads a url in string form that is converted into a URL object. URL is then scanned by a scanner object.
      Parameters:
      urlinput - string form of url to be read by scanner
      Returns:
      input a scanner object that scans the url provided by user
      Throws:
      IOException

    • extractPoem

      public ArrayList<String> extractPoem(Scanner input)
      Creates two ArrayLists, one to contain the full contents of the scanned url, and another to contain a specific portion of the scanned contents of the url. Returns second ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      input - scanner object of url input by user
      Returns:
      ArrayList object that contains a portion of the url content separated by a period.

    • countWords

      public HashMap<String,Integer> countWords(ArrayList<String> poemArray)
      Returns a HashMap with each word in the passed in ArrayList and the count of each occurrence of each word.
      Parameters:
      poemArray - ArrayList with part of the contents of the scanned url
      Returns:
      HashMap with each word in the scanned url and its count

    • sortHashMap

      public Map<String,Integer> sortHashMap(HashMap<String,Integer> wordCount)
      Creates a sorted HashMap from the one passed in. It sorts the HashMap by value from to greatest to smallest.
      Parameters:
      wordCount - HashMap with words and it's corresponding count
      Returns:
      sorted HashMap from greatest to smallest

    • printToFile

      public void printToFile(File file, Map<String,Integer> wordCount) throws FileNotFoundException
      Prints the sorted HashMap contents to a .txt file created from user input.
      Parameters:
      file - File object created by user
      wordCount - sorted HashMap
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

    • runTextAnalyzer

      public void runTextAnalyzer(String filename, String urlinput) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Runs all the methods in the class when called.
      Parameters:
      filename - String input from the user to name File object
      urlinput - String input from user to point to url to be scanned by Scanner object
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
      IOException
